title: 2nd Donation
body:
Hi Gaians! It's time for the second donation. This time we are going to be changing things up a bit. We will be allocating the percentage of the votes to each charity. That way ALL charities get a portion and no one is left out and your tokens speak for your charity.

See Reddit thread here for pictures: https://www.reddit.com/r/GaiaDAO/comments/ncltvl/gaiadao_second_donation/

The vote will go live Sunday, 12:00 UTC and will occur until Wednesday at 12:00 UTC.

We have 2 familiar faces from our last round and a new one joining us:

Orangutan Outreach

There are three species of orangutans and they are all CRITICALLY ENDANGERED in the wild. Orangutan Outreach works to protect wild orangutans in their forest homes and to assure that orphaned and displaced orangutans receive the care and support they need until they can be returned to their natural environment. YOU can help us make a difference in the lives of orangutans in Borneo and Sumatra.

Site: https://redapes.org/

Rain Forest Foundation

Tropical rainforests are the oldest and most diverse ecosystems on the planet. Undisturbed by ice ages for roughly 20 million years, rainforests have evolved to harbor a rich network of flora and fauna found nowhere else on Earth. Although rainforests span only 6% of the earth’s surface, they are home to half of the world’s animal and plant species.

Site: https://rainforestfoundation.org/our-work/priorities/

World Vision

When our work began in 1950, our approach was simple. We provided food and shelter for children in orphanages through child sponsorship. But we’ve learned a lot since then. Now we offer a full solution to poverty and injustice issues — and make it sustainable so it lasts.

We work in the most difficult contexts in the poorest countries, because we believe in the power of transformation. Find out more about our mission and values.

Our community development approach empowers children and families to break the cycle of poverty and reach their full potential.

Site: https://www.worldvision.org/about-us
author: 0xf69e3F1bd8F605aD78DDD38D278F8aE7Bf676360
